lead_paragraph: One Lucky Dane is out of the field for next month’s Kentucky Derby after injuring himself during a workout at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif.

headline.print_headline: One Lucky Dane Won’t Run Derby
headline.main: One Lucky Dane Won’t Run Derby

snippet: One Lucky Dane is out of the field for next month’s Kentucky Derby after injuring himself during a workout at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif.
abstract: One Lucky Dane injures himself during workout at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif, and will not compete in Kentucky Derby.
